item.title: gz and bz2 Not Supported by unarchive
item.description: Encountered this issue: The full traceback is: File "/tmp/ansible_f1UXSi/ansible_module_unarchive.py", line 151, in <module> from shlex import quote fatal: [206.81.5.18]: FAILED! => { "changed": false, "invocation": { "module_args": { "attributes": null, "backup": null, "content": null, "creates": null, "delimiter": null, "dest": "/root/", "directory_mode": null, "exclude": [], "extra_opts": [], "follow": false, "force": null, "group": null, "keep_newer": false, "list_files": false, "mode": null, "owner": null, "regexp": null, "remote_src": true, "selevel": null, "serole": null, "setype": null, "seuser": null, "src": "/root/my-files-2019-07-23.
